parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region to which the stack group belongs. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~131035~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: StackGroupName
parameters.description:
The name of the stack group. The name must be unique in a region.

The name can be up to 255 characters in length and can contain digits, letters, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). The name must start with a digit or a letter.
